projects.title: InventorySync: A Smart Dashboard for Warehouse Efficiency
projects.description: InventorySync is a smart dashboard that cleans, analyzes, and predicts warehouse data to improve inventory efficiency and demand forecasting.

research.title: Optimizing Supply Chain Logistics in Manufacturing to Increase Warehouse Efficiency Through Storage Optimization
research.description: This research focuses on optimizing supply chain logistics in manufacturing by improving warehouse efficiency through effective storage optimization.

books.title: The Martian
books.description: A gripping sci-fi novel about an astronaut stranded on Mars and his relentless struggle for survival, grounded in real-world science and problem-solving. A testament to human ingenuity.

books.title: Zero to One
books.description: Peter Thiel's insightful look at how to build a better future by creating new things. A must-read for anyone interested in startups, technology, and innovation.

books.title: Sapiens: A Brief History of Humankind
books.description: A fascinating exploration of human history, from the Stone Age to the present day, that challenges everything you thought you knew about being human.
